first_para: Richard Thomas Taylor, MBE, FRCP (born 7 July 1934) is an English doctor, politician and former Royal Air Force officer. He served as an Independent Member of Parliament for Wyre Forest between 2001 and 2010. He is Co-Leader of the National Health Action Party.

full.extract:
Richard Thomas Taylor, MBE, FRCP (born 7 July 1934) is an English doctor, politician and former Royal Air Force officer. He served as an Independent Member of Parliament for Wyre Forest between 2001 and 2010. He is Co-Leader of the National Health Action Party.
^ "Former MP to lead new political party opposed to NHS changes". BBC News. 14 May 2012. Retrieved 14 February 2015. 
^ Wyre Forest - Election Results 2010, BBC.
full.title: Richard Taylor (British politician)
